text: Ni jwajinjile mu nsinda pa ndema janti achinsyene nsindao akakumanyilila, basi ni wasimene mwalakwemo wandu wawili ali nkumenyana – jwinejo jwakuumila mwikuga lyakwe (mu wanache wa Israila), sano jwinejo jwakuumila mwa amagongo wakwe. Sano ajula jwakuumila mwikuga lyakwe jwam’bendile chikamuchisyo pa ajula jwakuumila mwa amagongo wakwe, basi Musa ni wantwanjile suwa ni kum’bulaga. Jwalakwe jwatite: “Ayi (yandesileyi) nimasengo gashetani; chisimu jwalakwe nimmagongo jwakusochelesya, jwakuonechela.”
